Description

Engineer Arena is a fun and frantic shooter centered around earning "bits" used to buy weapons, grenades, and new abilities at any time - and using those to defeat your friends in classic console-inspired local-split-screen FPS action. The game has modes that support up to 4 players, including Target Shot, Death Match, King of the Hill, and Capture the Flag.

History

WaveParadigm LLC is Adam Gincel, an independent game developer based in the New Jersey area. The company was founded in August 2018 when he worked with Alex Massenzio and students from Stevens Institute of Technology to work collaboratively on larger titles.
